sentences.sContent: John is a diehard conservative and is completely against abortion.
sentences.sContent_eng: John is a diehard conservative and is completely against abortion.
sentences.sCn: 约翰是个顽固的保守主义者，坚决反对堕胎。

synos.tran: 顽固分子；死不屈从者；倔强的人

remMethod.val: die(死) + hard(硬的) → 死硬(分子) → 顽固分子

trans.tranOther: someone who opposes change and refuses to accept new ideas
